title: Files on Former Police Officer Lacy M. Robertson (West Memphis Police Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arkansas Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1.	All records and evidence collected in relation to the decertification of former Officer Lacy M. Robertson of the West Memphis Police Department (hereinafter WMPD).
2.	All records, if any, referencing to misconducts of former Officer Lacy M. Robertson of the WMPD.
3.	All records, if any, referencing to investigations of any misconduct of former Officer Lacy M. Robertson of the WMPD.
4.	All records and evidence collected in relations to any investigation of any misconduct of former Officer Lacy M. Robertson of the WMPD.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sonny Albarado, a citizen of Arkansas, in coordination with Marc Howard.

title: 2920 Hamilton Church Road Fire Code violation request

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please provide information regarding any open Fire Code Violations for the following property: 2920 Hamilton Church Road (Autumn Lake)

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kent Hoover, a citizen of Tennessee, in coordination with Joshua O'fair.

title: University of Texas system drag show complaints (University of Texas, Arlington)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any Title IX (or similar) complaint or report referencing the word "in drag", "drag performance", "drag show", "drag shows", or "drag performances". This request is limited to complaints filed on or after January 1, 2020.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Adam Steinbaugh

title: 2225 3rd Avenue N Building Code and Certificate of Occupancy Request

communications.subject: Alabama Open Records Law Request: 2225 3rd Avenue N Building Code and Certificate of Occupancy Request
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Alabama Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Please provide information regarding any open Building Code Violations as well as copies of the Certificates of Occupancy for the following property: 2225 3rd Avenue N (Market Lofts on Third)



 
Feel free to contact me should you have any questions.

Thank you and have a good day.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

André Natta, a citizen of Alabama, in coordination with Joshua O'fair.
